akn:section.akn:heading: Facilities for advanced training of maintenance technicians for air carrier aircraft

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 48110. Facilities for advanced training of maintenance technicians for air carrier aircraft For the fiscal years ending September 30, 1993–1995, amounts necessary to carry out section 44515 11 See References in Text note below. of this title may be appropriated to the Secretary of Transportation out of the Airport and Airway Trust Fund established under section 9502 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 (26 U.S.C. 9502). The amounts remain available until expended. (Pub. L. 103–272, § 1(e), July 5, 1994, 108 Stat. 1297.)
Historical and Revision Notes
RevisedSectionSource (U.S. Code)Source (Statutes at Large)
4811049 App.:1354 (note).Oct. 31, 1992, Pub. L. 102–581, § 119(d), 106 Stat. 4884.
The words “to the Secretary of Transportation” are added for clarity and consistency in this chapter.
Editorial Notes
References in TextSection 44515 of this title, referred to in text, was repealed by Pub. L. 118–63, title IV, § 401(a), May 16, 2024, 138 Stat. 1148.
